price: But if We send a [harmful] wind and they see [their crops] turning yellow, they become ungrateful thereafter[21].
arabic: وَلَئِنۡ أَرۡسَلۡنَا رِيحٗا فَرَأَوۡهُ مُصۡفَرّٗا لَّظَلُّواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ يَكۡفُرُونَ
footnotes: [21] i.e., they become ungrateful to the previous favors of Allah.
